meanings.definition: A person or thing that selects.
meanings.sent1: The selectors at the store helped me find the perfect dress.
meanings.sent2: The selectors in the team picked the best player for the match.
meanings.sent3: The selectors in the garden decided which flowers to bloom first.
meanings.sent4: The selectors of the group were like expert chefs choosing the finest ingredients.
meanings.sent5: The selectors in the library carefully curated the collection.

meanings.definition: A device used to choose between two or more options.
meanings.sent1: The remote control is a handy selectors for changing channels.
meanings.sent2: The selectors on the vending machine let you pick your favorite snack.
meanings.sent3: The selectors on the phone made it easy to switch between apps.
meanings.sent4: The selectors on the thermostat help regulate the temperature in the room.
meanings.sent5: The selectors on the music player allow you to skip songs easily.

meanings.definition: A method of choosing elements from a set.
meanings.sent1: Random selectors were used to pick the winner of the raffle.
meanings.sent2: The selectors in the algorithm determine the best route to take.
meanings.sent3: The selectors in the game decided the fate of the characters.
meanings.sent4: The selectors in the survey ensured a fair representation of opinions.
meanings.sent5: The selectors in the software help filter out unnecessary data.
